Hey everyone.
=A0
It looks like I'm going to have to take time away from NB=
W. I have had some new financial issues come up, revolving around my car bl=
owing up and needing to afford a new one. I'm not going to be able to affor=
d internet service for a while. Hopefully I'll get everything set before to=
o long and be able to return.
=A0
Untill then I'm sure people here will be =
able to manage the storylines and my characters. Preston, I'll leave Rodimu=
s to you so you can finish out the plans we had.
=A0
Hope to be back soon.
=
=A0
Robo

<table cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" border="0" ><tr><td valign="top" style="font: inherit;"><DIV>Hey everyone.</DIV>
<DIV> </DIV>
<DIV>It looks like I'm going to have to take time away from NBW. I have had some new financial issues come up, revolving around my car blowing up and needing to afford a new one. I'm not going to be able to afford internet service for a while. Hopefully I'll get everything set before too long and be able to return.</DIV>
<DIV> </DIV>
<DIV>Untill then I'm sure people here will be able to manage the storylines and my characters. Preston, I'll leave Rodimus to you so you can finish out the plans we had.</DIV>
<DIV> </DIV>
<DIV>Hope to be back soon.</DIV>
<DIV> </DIV>
<DIV>Robo</DIV></td></tr></table><br>
